definitions.definition: (of an argument, theory, or policy) logical and consistent.
examples: they failed to develop a coherent economic strategy
synonyms: comprehensible "the patient's speech is more coherent today"

definitions.definition: (of a person) able to speak clearly and logically.
examples: she was lucid and coherent and did not appear to be injured

definitions.definition: united as or forming a whole.
examples: divided into a number of geographically coherent kingdoms

definitions.definition: (of waves) having a constant phase relationship.
